function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction of environmental noise level","Impact":"Reduction of environmental noise can lead to decreased stress and improved mental health for individuals, but it may also lead to a lack of awareness of potential danger in the environment.","Mitigation":"Implementing sound-masking technologies and maintaining awareness of potential hazards can help mitigate the impact of reduced environmental noise.","Technologies":"Sound-masking systems, white noise machines, and ear protection devices can help manage reduced environmental noise.","People":"General population, individuals in urban areas, and wildlife in natural habitats.","Owner":"Urban planners, environmental agencies, and individuals can implement noise mitigation measures."},{"Description":"Drop of PM 2.5 in large parts of China","Impact":"Reduction in PM 2.5 levels can improve air quality and lead to positive health outcomes, but it may also create a false sense of security regarding overall air quality and mask other air pollutants.","Mitigation":"Continued monitoring of air quality, public awareness campaigns, and implementation of sustainable air quality policies are essential to mitigate the impact of reduced PM 2.5 levels.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, emission control technologies, and sustainable energy solutions can contribute to sustaining improved air quality.","People":"Population in areas with improved air quality, public health officials, and policymakers.","Owner":"Environmental agencies, public health organizations, and government bodies are responsible for implementing measures to sustain improved air quality."},{"Description":"Clean beaches due to lack of tourists","Impact":"Cleaner beaches can provide a positive visual and environmental impact, but they may also lead to complacency in addressing ongoing pollution problems and impact local economies dependent on tourism.","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable tourism practices, community outreach programs, and ongoing beach maintenance are essential to sustain the benefits of cleaner beaches.","Technologies":"Smart waste management systems, beach cleaning equipment, and environmental monitoring technologies can contribute to maintaining clean beaches.","People":"Coastal communities, tourists, and environmental conservation groups are stakeholders in sustaining clean beaches.","Owner":"Local authorities, tourism organizations, and environmental agencies hold responsibility for maintaining clean beaches and promoting sustainable tourism."}]}
